Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Hello, Commandant! Have you been playing any good games recently?', 4: '1'}
{2: "I don't think my mission includes searching for games.", 3: '7'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "That's true!", 4: '1'}
{2: "I can ask if the WGAA's recovered any new games lately.", 3: '9'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Hm... That's not necessary. Nanami has completed every game WGAA's Archaeological Team recovered!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'How did you find their inventory list of excavated items...?', 3: '11'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "I'm so bored! I've run out of games!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "There will be a day when Nanami completes all the existing games in the world... There aren't a lot of new titles being published nowadays. How sad it is!", 4: '1'}
{2: "Why don't you make a new one, then, Nanami?", 3: '15'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Although Nanami has made some in the past...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mostly as a way to cause troubles.', 3: '18'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Hey! Now... if Nanami designs a game earnestly, will it impact the players the same way the games I played moved me?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'What kind of games do you think are the most impactful?', 3: '21'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Games with great graphics? Or maybe good stories? Or just fun mechanics? None of them seems to be that important to Nanami...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Right! Nanami likes the kind of games where she can feel the passion of the creators!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'They may not be perfect, but they are like windows to the hearts of the designers.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: "Then you don't have to worry about how your game plays.", 3: '28'}
{2: "You just have to be genuine about what you're making.", 3: '29'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Yes! You're absolutely right, Commandant!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "And Nanami is better at doing what she can think of instead of figuring out every little detail, isn't she?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Just thinking about creating a world of my own makes Nanami so excited! Don't you think so, Commandant?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yeah, indeed.', 3: '34'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "In that case, I'll leave the script and the gameplay design to you, Commandant! Nanami isn't the best at doing those, I must admit.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Hold on! It's your game, Nanami... Shouldn't it be your world?", 3: '37'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Huh? But you're always part of Nanami's world, Commandant! What's wrong with that?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "That's it, then! We'll have our first game-making operation meeting tomorrow!", 4: '1'}
